name: Sartorial
description: Challenge creativity on a daily basis, through a photo sharing platform and also build brand loyalty.

name: Tidal
description: Is there a way tsunami impact could be reduced? This project focused on procedural design for an earthquake and tsunami evacuation.

name: Concert Infograph
description: Ever wonder where music artists make all that sweet dough? This case studies explores the world of music concerts, the cost it takes to bring them to the people and the profit margins musicians see from it.

name: Misfit Wearables Internship
description: Working hard at Misfit for my summer 2015 internship. These designs show some of my work.

name: Nomad
description: Going on a vacation involves a lot of planning. There should be an easier way to travel while skipping this tedious process, and get an experience which is tailored to one's tastes.
